content: With the new arrivals and a dinner party like this... You're already living the good life, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>.
info: 躺下入梦-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本II

content: Maybe when we wake up, there'll be even more fun things waiting on our planet.
info: 躺下入梦-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A害羞挠头}Tee-hee, anyway, our planet has a new arrival, and it's even livelier now! I'm over the moon!
info: 躺下入梦-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本II

content: The Luca Arbor's still small now, but I've got a feeling it's gonna grow into a massive tree!
info: 躺下入梦-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本II

content: But, I mean, are we gonna stuff ourselves this much every time we have a get together? I feel like I need to run three hundred laps... but Mobai says it's time for <style=Highlight>bed</style>.
info: 躺下入梦-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本II

content: Then our planet's gonna be super wild and super fun! 'Cause you're awesome, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>! Swoosh!
info: 躺下入梦-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A得意}Me? I'm not sleepy at all! I'm gonna stay here and have a staring contest with the stars! Let's see who blinks first!

content: {A笑眯眯}Time really flies when you're busy, huh? <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, feeling tired? Find a <style=Highlight>bed</style> and get some well-earned rest.

content: Actually, we have this secret organization called "Guess Where Mobai's Eyes Are." Wanna join?

content: I really want to know what Mobai's eyes actually look like... {A惊讶}Eh? <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>! Y-You heard that?
